description:
Kigata and other students at Ishido Middle School come to Kyoto for their school trip. That day later in the evening, one of the female student, Okuyama faints in anemia and started to confess that she is haunted and attacked by a vampire. There is a bite mark with blood on one of her arms.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Pages in Red (The World of Bizarrerie) Someone bites. Part 1
